briefTitle: SH L 562BB Phase II/III Dose Justification and Gadoteridol-controlled Comparative Study

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Japanese patients at least 20 years of age
* Patients with diagnosed primary cancer
* Patients with metastatic lesions by CT/MRI

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who have contraindication to the MRI examinations
* Patients who have severe renal disorder
* Patients in extremely serious general condition

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Lesions Detected by Blinded Readers (BR) and Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of metastatic lesions (unenhanced and enhanced) per participant detected on postcontrast Magnetic resonance (MR) images by averaged blinded reader and investigator

outcomeMeasures.title: Score of Visibility Assessment - Degree of Lesion Contrast Enhancement by Blinded Reader
outcomeMeasures.description: Degree of contrast enhancement for each lesion on postcontrast MR images using the 4-point scale by averaged blinded reader (Score 1=No, 2=Moderate, 3=Good, 4=Excellent)

outcomeMeasures.title: Score of Visibility Assessment - Degree of Lesion Contrast Enhancement by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Degree of contrast enhancement for each lesion on postcontrast MR images using the 4-point scale by investigator (Score 1=No, 2=Moderate, 3=Good, 4=Excellent)

outcomeMeasures.title: Score of Visibility Assessment - Border Delineation by Blinded Reader
outcomeMeasures.description: Border delineation for each lesion on postcontrast MR images using the 4-point scale by averaged blinded reader (Score 1=None, 2=Moderate, 3=Good, 4=Excellent)

outcomeMeasures.title: Score of Visibility Assessment - Border Delineation by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Border delineation for each lesion on postcontrast MR images using the 4-point scale by investigator (Score 1=None, 2=Moderate, 3=Good, 4=Excellent)

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Planning Confidence - Gadobutrol 0.1 mmol/kg bw vs. Gadoteridol (ProHance) 0.2 mmol/kg bw by Treatment Planning Experts (TPE)
outcomeMeasures.description: Treatment planning confidence evaluated separately for each image set (gadobutrol \[Gado-\] 0.1 mmol/kg bw and gadoteridol \[Pro-\] 0.2 mmol/kg) by TPE (category: not confident, confident, and not assessable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Planning Confidence - Gadobutrol 0.1 mmol/kg bw vs. Gadoteridol (ProHance) 0.2 mmol/kg bw by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Treatment planning confidence evaluated separately for each image set (gadobutrol 0.1 mmol/kg bw and gadoteridol 0.2 mmol/kg) by investigator (category: not confident, confident, and not assessable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Planning Confidence - Gadobutrol 0.2 mmol/kg bw vs. Gadoteridol (ProHance) 0.2 mmol/kg bw by TPE
outcomeMeasures.description: Treatment planning confidence evaluated separately for each image set (gadobutrol 0.2 mmol/kg bw and gadoteridol 0.2 mmol/kg) by TPE (category: not confident, confident, and not assessable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Planning Confidence - Gadobutrol 0.2 mmol/kg bw vs. Gadoteridol (ProHance) 0.2 mmol/kg bw by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Treatment planning confidence evaluated separately for each image set (gadobutrol 0.2 mmol/kg bw and gadoteridol 0.2 mmol/kg) by investigator (category: not confident, confident, and not assessable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Performance in Stereotactic Radiosurgery (SRS) Planning by TPE
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparison of overall image quality for SRS treatment planning between gadobutrol and gadoteridol by TPE

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Performance in Stereotactic Radiosurgery (SRS) Planning by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparison of overall image quality for SRS treatment planning between gadobutrol and gadoteridol by investigator

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Reasons for Performance in SRS Planning by TPE
outcomeMeasures.description: Reasons for comparison results of overall image quality for SRS treatment planning between gadobutrol and gadoteridol by investigator (multiple answers applicable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Reasons for Performance in SRS Planning by Investigator
outcomeMeasures.description: Reasons for comparison results of overall image quality for SRS treatment planning between gadobutrol and gadoteridol by investigator (multiple answers applicable)

outcomeMeasures.title: Lesion Size Evaluated by Independent Radiologist
outcomeMeasures.description: Size of each lesion on postcontrast MR images evaluated by independent radiologist (mean and standard deviation of 603 lesions)

outcomeMeasures.title: Contrast Noise Ratio (CNR) of Lesions Evaluated by Independent Radiologist
outcomeMeasures.description: CNR of lesion/normal white matter based on the signal intensity of MR images evaluated by independent radiologist (mean and standard deviation of 306 lesions)

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraclass Correlation Coefficient (ICC) Among 3 Blinded Readers on the Number of Detected Lesions
outcomeMeasures.description: ICC among 3 blinded readers calculated for number of detected lesions using the statistical model with two random effects, i.e., blinded readers and individual patients.
